bibl.title: Theft and Taxes. A Series of Short Documents (P. Petra inv. 69. 1-8).
Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume II
bibl.author: VESTERINEN, Marjaana

bibl.note: Preliminary presentation of P. Petra Inv. 69, 1-6. Numbers 69, 1-5 deal with the tax payments of Patrophilos son of Bassos, one of the key figures of the whole archive. Number 69, 6 (the only complete text in the whole archive) discusses a theft.
VESTERINEN Marjaana, Theft and Taxes. A Series of Short Documents (P. Petra inv. 69. 1-8).

Isabella ANDORLINI, Guido BASTIANINI, Manfredo MANFREDI e Giovanna MENCI (a cura di), Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume II (Firenze, 2001) pp. 1281-1285, 1 tabl.
